rows.label: tev000993_MSG0001
rows.name: Hello, [ST:playername ].[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000993_MSG0002
rows.name: I've just been straightening out a ne'er-do-well.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000993_MSG0003
rows.name:
He performs no useful function for New LA,
yet complains about his lot in life constantly.
Therefore, I took it upon myself to set him straight.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000993_MSG0004
rows.name:
At the end of my lecture, the young hoodlum attempted
to tackle me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000993_MSG0005
rows.name: I was pleased to see he still had some spirit![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000993_MSG0006
rows.name: But the follow-through was quite lacking.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000993_MSG0007
rows.name:
If he continues to scorn the duties that have been
assigned to him, then something must be done.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000993_MSG0008
rows.name:
I'm considering taking him outside the city on a
BLADE assignment that demonstrates the life-or-death
stakes we're dealing with. What do you think?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000993_MSG0009
rows.name:
At the very least, it should give him a renewed
appreciation for what it means to live within the
high walls of New LA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000993_JNK0010
rows.name: Approve

rows.label: tev000993_SEL0011
rows.name: Tell Bozé you think it's a fine idea.

rows.label: tev000993_JNK0020
rows.name: Disapprove

rows.label: tev000993_SEL0021
rows.name: Tell Bozé you're worried he'll get the man killed.

rows.label: tev000993_MSG0010
rows.name: I thought you might like it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000993_MSG0011
rows.name:
A man must know himself before he can find meaning
in his life.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000993_MSG0012
rows.name:
There are many ways a New LA citizen can contribute
without ever setting foot on a field of battle.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000993_MSG0013
rows.name:
It's all about spirit. If we can find a way to get through
to him, I believe he can change.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000993_MSG0014
rows.name: Belay such fears. I will look after him.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000993_MSG0015
rows.name:
I believe he needs to stand in another man's shoes
to learn who he himself is.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000993_MSG0016
rows.name:
His incessant indolence and discontent are born of a
belief that he lacks the power to affect change.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000993_MSG0017
rows.name:
There are many ways a New LA citizen can contribute
without ever setting foot on a field of battle.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000993_MSG0018
rows.name:
It's all about spirit. If we can find a way to get through
to him, I believe he can change.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000993_MSG0019
rows.name:
The moment I berated him was the moment I accepted
him as a student.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000993_MSG0020
rows.name:
So then! What would you consider to be an
appropriate first assignment for this delinquent?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000993_JNK0030
rows.name: Harrier

rows.label: tev000993_SEL0031
rows.name: Send him out to defeat a tyrant.

rows.label: tev000993_JNK0040
rows.name: Curator

rows.label: tev000993_SEL0041
rows.name: Send him out to gather collectibles.

rows.label: tev000993_JNK0050
rows.name: Mediator

rows.label: tev000993_SEL0051
rows.name: Send him out to maintain order in New LA.

rows.label: tev000993_MSG0021
rows.name: Even to an amateur, you show no mercy! I approve.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000993_MSG0022
rows.name:
Yes, it could prove a tad dangerous, but I will support
him with all of my strength.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000993_MSG0023
rows.name:
A little taste of sheer terror should illuminate all sorts
of truths for him.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000993_MSG0024
rows.name: Hmm. That just might be the perfect mission.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000993_MSG0025
rows.name:
It's relatively safe, and can be accomplished fairly close
to New LA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000993_MSG0026
rows.name:
That would give him a means to escape from any
indigen he couldn't handle.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000993_MSG0027
rows.name: Bah! You coddle the man![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000993_MSG0028
rows.name:
How could one who knows no order of his own
possibly maintain it for others?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000993_MSG0029
rows.name: I think I'll give him an Interceptor job instead.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000993_MSG0030
rows.name:
The experience of risking his life should illuminate all
sorts of truths for him.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000993_MSG0031
rows.name:
Well, I'm going to bring him to the maintenance center.
If the good doctors are able to patch him up,
he'll begin his BLADE assignment at once.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000993_MSG0032
rows.name: I cannot wait to meet the man he's about to become.[ST:wait ]
